Name: Model HL-1
Desc: A device used by the Black Shores to monitor the status of each of the Sentinels. This model bears the serial HL-1. The meter reads 0.
Bg: It is the Black Shores' duty to monitor the Sentinels, who are at the forefront of keeping the Lament and Threnodians at bayâ€”yet it seems some have found ways to evade their surveillance.
